creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Yukiko and Richard Genardini
description: tall, celadon vase with wide top tapering to narrow base; short, raised neck with wide lip; vertical inscribed lines with pattern of short, intersecting lines with grass pattern
marks: Signature bottom: [ 池光高麗青磁研究所　池福善作 ]
title: Vase
